name: Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Elephant
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 face-up "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap you control to the GY; Special Summon 1 "Fire Fist" monster from your hand, except "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Elephant". You can target 1 "Fire Formation" Spell/Trap in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then, you can add 1 Level 5 or higher "Fire Fist" monster from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Brotherhood of the Fire Fist - Elephant" once per turn.
